articles.title: This DIY project turns an iPod into a click wheel-powered Spotify player - Circuit Breaker
articles.description: Tinkerer Guy Dupont has taken out the guts of a classic iPod and replaced them with a Raspberry Pi to make it support Spotify. Through some electronics and software wizardry, it still looks and controls like an iPod.
